home.splash.h2: Form validation solution for any developer.
home.splash.p: Simple to use, useful features and user-friendly interface.
home.services.rocket.title: As fast as a Ferrari

home.services.design.title: Design
home.services.design.detail: You can use our own form theme if you wish.
home.environments.codacy.detail: Codes refactoring by code review. Goal is reach best code quality.

sidebar.gettingStarted.title: GETTING STARTED
sidebar.gettingStarted.installation.gith: You can clone repo from Github and free use in your project. Copy this code and paste code in console.
You can download up to date npm package. Copy this code and paste code in console.
sidebar.gettingStarted.usage.title: Usage
sidebar.gettingStarted.usage.js.detail: Place one of the following script near the end of your pages, right before the closing body tag, to enable them. jQuery must come first, then our JavaScript plugin.
sidebar.gettingStarted.usage.css.detail: Copy-paste the stylesheet into your before all other stylesheets to load our CSS. You can use ready-made theme if you want.
sidebar.gettingStarted.usage.html.detail: You must use class for working plugin. You can use code below.
sidebar.api.title: API
sidebar.api.options.title: Options
sidebar.api.options.buttonDisabled.detai: Form button is disabled. If success fill form, form button is enabled.
sidebar.api.options.keyUpOption.detail: If form element is changed, form element is validated.
sidebar.api.options.focusOutOption.detai: Form element is validated only if focus out.
sidebar.api.classes.title: Classes
sidebar.api.classes.supremeValidate.deta: You must add this class on form element if you want form validation.
sidebar.api.classes.supremeValidateEleme: You must add this class on form item element for to be validation.
sidebar.api.classes.checkboxList.detail: You must add this class on check-box element for validation.
sidebar.api.classes.radioList.detail: You must add this class on radio-button element for validation.
sidebar.api.attributes.title: Attributes
sidebar.api.attributes.errorMessage.deta: Custom error message after fail validation.
sidebar.api.attributes.minCheck.detail: Determines the minimum amount of options to be selected.
sidebar.api.events.title: Events
sidebar.api.events.onSuccess.detail: This function will work after success form validation.
sidebar.api.events.onError.detail: This function will work after fail form validation.
sidebar.support.title: SUPPORT
sidebar.support.browser.title: Browser
sidebar.support.contact.title: Contact
sidebar.support.contact.detail: You can send mail for questions and problems. I am waiting every time your feedback. Please help me for better development my project. You can fast reach me in email.
